string.name: signUp
string.u: Do not have an account? Sign up now

resources.string: Enter your registered mobile number and email below:
Q1.What will be the timing of the training ?

A2.As this a purely online training program, you can choose to learn at any time of the day. We will recommend a pace to be followed throughout the program,but the actual timing and learning hours can be decided by students according to their convenience.
Q2.How will the training be delivered ?

A2. You will be taught using pre-recorded videos and text tutorials. The training has quizzes,assignment, and tests to help ypu learn better. At the end of the training you will be attempt a project of what to get hands-on practice of what you learn during your training.
Q3.What is the duration of training?
A3.The training duration is of 6 weeks.
Q4.How much time should I spend everyday?
A4.We recommend spending 10-12 hours per week.However,the actual learning hours can be decided by you as per convenience.
Q5.When can I start my training?
A5.You can choose your preferred batch date while signing up for thr training program.
